mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mem_his(mem_his_no, at_no, mem_his_seqno, mem_no, mem_his_date) VALUES (mem_his_seq.nextval, #{at_no}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(mem_his_seqno), 0) + 1 as mem_his_seqno FROM mem_his), #{mem_no}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT mem_his_no, at_no, mem_his_seqno, mem_no, mem_his_date FROM mem_his ORDER BY mem_his_no ASC
